column4: ive got a problem with ubuntu from booting., it tells me "Users $HOME/.dmrc file is being ignored, thisa prevents the default sessions and language from being saved"
ive got a problem with ubuntu from booting., it tells me "Users $HOME/.dmrc file is being ignored, thisa prevents the default sessions and language from being saved"
Does it say why it's being ignored?  Permissions are wonky perhaps?
